p: (3) Ferric Reducing Antioxidant Potential (FRAP). The antioxidant capacity of Combretin A and B was determined using the FRAP assay ( Figure 1(c)). Combretin B showed the highest and most significant antioxidant capacity ( p < 0.001), followed by Combretin A. Both compounds exhibited a similar upward trend in activity with an increased concentration.
